alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:11PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Otero County through 600 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Timpas, or 22 miles west of La Junta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, torrential rainfall, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
